pages.page: CLASSIC BUCKLES Buckles Classic

CLASSIC BUCKLES
Montana Silversmiths classic buckle designs are the result of 47 years of buckle building excellence and our world class master engraving. The classic buckles section is filled with authentic detailed designs in a variety of rich jeweler’s finishes. Select designs from our classic buckles include our hand-sculpted figures; miniature works of art that add an extra touch to the piece.
Made in Montana Montana Armor® When marked with this emblem it assures Utilizing state of the art techniques acquired from 47 years in business, you and your customer that this piece is Classic Buckles hand-crafted and touched by as many Montana Armor extends the durability MONT ® as twenty-five caring sets of hands in our of each item against the effects of MONTANAANA ARMOR chemicals, tarnishing and abrasion. Classic Buckles
The Mountain
Glacier Turquoise
The Mountain Glacier Turquoise stone is inspired by the colorful rocks of Lake MacDonald, in Montana's Glacier National Park. Each unique stone is comprised of vibrantly colored oyster shell, natural hand-cut turquoise, extracted from the Kingman mine of Arizona and infused with rich copper.
36710YG-960L Mountain Glacier Turquoise 4.375” x 3.375” MSRP $140

Classic Buckles
GERMAN SILVER
German Silver is a trade name for full 18% Nickel polished to a jewelry finish. There is no silver in German Silver. Rope edges are hand applied jeweler’s bronze. These individually crafted buckle's patina may vary. Buckles are shown at actual size.
